properties.name: Chichen Itza
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage Mayan ruins and New Seven Wonders of the World

properties.name: Copper Canyon (Barrancas del Cobre)
properties.description: Larger and deeper than Grand Canyon with six interconnected canyons and scenic railway

properties.name: Cenotes of Yucatan
properties.description: Over 6,000 sacred Mayan sinkholes with crystal-clear waters for swimming and diving

properties.name: Teotihuacan
properties.description: Ancient city with massive Pyramids of the Sun and Moon, third-largest pyramid in the world

properties.name: Sumidero Canyon
properties.description: 35-million-year-old canyon with 1,000-meter walls along the Grijalva River

properties.name: Monarch Butterfly Reserve
properties.description: UNESCO site where millions of monarchs winter in mountain forests near Mexico City

properties.name: Hierve el Agua
properties.description: Petrified waterfalls and natural infinity pools overlooking Oaxacan valleys

properties.name: Sian Ka'an Biosphere
properties.description: Second-largest biosphere in Mexico with pristine Caribbean coastline
